items.title: Tech Partners of ISACON AP 2022
items.text: We are the Tech Partners for the International Conference of ISACON AP 2022( Indian Society of Anaesthesiologists ) Conducted in India.

items.title: Tech Team Behind APNGA
items.text: We are the Tech Team behind the APNGA ( Andhra Pradesh Nursery Growers Association ) and supported the Govt in Multiple Tech Areas.

items.title: Marketing Team behind SSDA - Top 2nd Defence Academy in Telangana
items.text: We are the Marketing team behind Sri Sai Defence Academy. We helped them to acheive 37k Subscribers for their Youtube channel in the span of 1 Years

items.title: Tech Team behind CureWantri
items.text: Curewantri is a startup that is aimed to disrupt the Medical Industry by Innovative Solutions through their App.
